ModMetaData.name: Yinglets!
ModMetaData.author: Chrysopoeia and ValSalia
ModMetaData.description:
<size=18> Derpy, stilt-legged and sometimes usually on fire,</size> <size=22> It's the official Yinglet mod for Rimworld!</size>
1.5 support is new, and bugs are expected - try not to overwrite old saves just yet! Please report any gamebreaking bugs in the Steam thread or in #YingWorld channel on the OoPs Discord, and enjoy~
<size=24>Features coming soon:</size>
• Younglet nurseries! Don't let them out of your sight! • Breeding rooms. No more needing beds for getting eggs! • Trait inheritance! Get those good looks the old fashioned way. • And MORE! What? Who knows. I sure don't!
<size=24>Issues that have fixes in the works:</size>
• Younglets grow directly into full-size yinglets. • Adults get extra unwanted growth points Temporary! • Editor mods can't change fur and hair colors. • Random harmless lifestage error happens sometimes. • Bed graphics need to be moved down a little bit.
